title: 9/1. No Fee. Cozy 2 br w/ UTILITIES & Parking
map_address: American Legion Hwy near Hyde Park Ave
posting_body: ['No agent fee.', 'Available on 9/1.', 'Heat, hot water and gas stove are included.', 'Tenant pays only electric bill.', 'Bright and spacious renovated top floor 2 BR offers:', '- hardwood floors throughout', '- open living dining area', '- sliding glass doors to balcony', '- tons of closet space', '- top floor, building with elevator', '- laundry in the building', '- assigned parking', '- steps from shopping center', '- 1.5 miles from Forest Hills on 32&14 bus line', 'Nice and convenient neighborhood, right next to the shops, supermarket, pharmacy, fitness club and restaurants.', '5 minutes to Forest Hills T station.', 'Buses #32 and #14 to Forest Hills Station stops right in front of the building.', 'Ideal for anyone commuting to downtown, Northeastern University, Longwood Medical area, Faulkner Hospital or somewhere just close to the city by T, bus, bike or a car.']
